alert.note: Alert for Routt (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 20 at 2:43PM MDT until May 24 at 7:11PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Elk River at Milner affecting Routt County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Elk River at Milner. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, water is nearing ranch buildings between County Road 44 and the Elk River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM MDT Saturday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 8.0 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 7.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.0 feet on 06/08/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Elk River Milner 7.5 7.1 Sat 1 pm MDT 7.5 7.6 7.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
